title: OriginAI - Build custom enterprise software using GenAI
introduction: Origin is a platform that allows users to build custom CRMs and deploy them into production environments using simple business language prompts. It is particularly tailored for the pharmaceutical industry.

faqs.question: What can Origin be used for?
faqs.answer: Origin can be used to build custom CRMs, deploy entire websites, create bespoke web applications, and set up associated production infrastructure.

faqs.question: How does Origin work?
faqs.answer: Origin uses simple business language prompts to build and deploy custom CRMs and other web applications.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: The website does not mention a free trial.

faqs.question: Who is the target audience for Origin?
faqs.answer: The platform is particularly tailored for businesses in the pharmaceutical industry.

faqs.question: How can I start using Origin?
faqs.answer: You can sign up for an invite to their alpha program and specify your use case to get bumped up the list.
